description: This table contains the list of the patient's current blood special requirements.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BLOOD_SPECIAL_REQTS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The special requirements category ID for a patient who has special requirements for blood transfusions.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Irradiated


CMV Negative


Leukoreduced


Sickle Cell (Hgb S) Negative


Concentrate


HLA Match


Solid-Phase Red-Cell Adherence


PLA-1 Negative


Cryoreduced


Washed


PAS


Plasma Compatible

columns.name: BLOOD_SPECIAL_REQTS_DEGREE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the degree to which a blood special requirement is critical for patient care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: BLOOD_SPECIAL_REQTS_ADD_INFO
columns.description: This item stores additional information to describe a blood special requirement in cases where the name does not adequately describe the requirement. This item can also be used to describe why the requirement is necessary.
